titles.title: Accelerating Nuclear Innovation through Fee Reform Act
Accelerating Nuclear Innovation through Fee Reform Act
To exclude costs of reviewing applications for advanced nuclear reactor licenses from the activities for which the Nuclear Regulatory Commission assesses fees, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy.

bill.summary:
Accelerating Nuclear Innovation through Fee Reform Act
This bill prohibits the Nuclear Regulatory Commission from charging fees to review applications for advanced nuclear reactor licenses.
